steps.observation: Chris Menges BSC, ASC (born 15 September 1940) is an English cinematographer and film director.  He is a member of both the American and British Societies of Cinematographers.

steps.thought: Now that I have information about Chris Menges, I can see that he is a cinematographer and film director. To confirm that Aram Avakian shares the same occupation, I'll retrieve the document about Aram Avakian to gather more information.
steps.observation: Aram A. Avakian (April 23, 1926 – January 17, 1987) was an Armenian-American film editor and director.  His work in the latter role includes "Jazz on a Summer's Day" (1960) and the indie film "End of the Road" (1970).

steps.thought: From the information about Aram Avakian, I see that he was a film director, but also a film editor, whereas Chris Menges is a cinematographer and film director. However, they both share the occupation of film director. I have enough information to answer the question.
